title: Add support for computing GeoHash neighbors to GeoHashUtils
description: This simple feature adds the ability to compute the geohash neighbor(s) at a given level, from a provided geohash. Such a utility is beneficial for simple grid faceting/aggregations and geohash based bounding box queries.

comments.author: Nicholas Knize
comments.content: Initial patch that computes the neighbor(s) from a provided GeoHash.  Javadocs and unit testing included.

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Thanks Nicholas Knize, looks good, I'll commit shortly...
